verses.text: The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*. Behold, \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w* is taken \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from \add being\add* a \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and it shall be a \w ruinous|strong="H4654"\w* \w heap|strong="H4596"\w*.

The \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w* \add are\add* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w*: they shall be for \w flocks|strong="H5739"\w*, which shall lie \w down|strong="H7257"\w*, and none shall make \add them\add* \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*.

The \w fortress|strong="H4013"\w* also shall \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* from \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* from \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, and the \w remnant|strong="H7605"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*: they shall be as the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

And in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* it shall come to pass, \add that\add* the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* shall be made \w thin|strong="H1809"\w*, and the \w fatness|strong="H4924"\w* of his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* shall wax \w lean|strong="H7329"\w*.

And it shall be as when the \w harvestman|strong="H7105"\w* \w gathereth|strong="H0622"\w* the \w corn|strong="H7054"\w*, and \w reapeth|strong="H7114"\w* the \w ears|strong="H7641"\w* with his \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*; and it shall be as he that \w gathereth|strong="H3950"\w* \w ears|strong="H7641"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Rephaim|strong="H7497"\w*.

¶ Yet gleaning \w grapes|strong="H5955"\w* shall be \w left|strong="H7604"\w* in it, as the \w shaking|strong="H5363"\w* of an olive \w tree|strong="H2132"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \add or\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w berries|strong="H1620"\w* in the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the uppermost \w bough|strong="H0534"\w*, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \add or\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* in the outmost \w fruitful|strong="H6509"\w* \w branches|strong="H5585"\w* thereof, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

At that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w look|strong="H8159"\w* to his \w Maker|strong="H6213"\w*, and his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shall have \w respect|strong="H7200"\w* to the \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* One of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he shall not \w look|strong="H8159"\w* to the \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, neither shall \w respect|strong="H7200"\w* \add that\add* which his \w fingers|strong="H0676"\w* have \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, either the \w groves|strong="H0842"\w*, or the \w images|strong="H2553"\w*.\f + \fr 17.8 \ft images: or, sun images\f*

¶ In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall his \w strong|strong="H4581"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* be as a \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w bough|strong="H2793"\w*, and an uppermost \w branch|strong="H0534"\w*, which they \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and there shall be \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w*.

Because thou hast \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of thy \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*, and hast not been \w mindful|strong="H2142"\w* of the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* of thy \w strength|strong="H4581"\w*, therefore shalt thou \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w pleasant|strong="H5282"\w* \w plants|strong="H5194"\w*, and shalt \w set|strong="H2232"\w* it with \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w slips|strong="H2156"\w*:

In the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou make thy \w plant|strong="H5194"\w* to \w grow|strong="H7735"\w*, and in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* shalt thou make thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* to \w flourish|strong="H6524"\w*: \add but\add* the \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w heap|strong="H5067"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w grief|strong="H2470"\w* and of \w desperate|strong="H0605"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H3511"\w*.\f + \fr 17.11 \ft a heap…: or, removed in the day of inheritance, and there shall be deadly sorrow\f*

¶ \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add which\add* make a \w noise|strong="H1993"\w* like the \w noise|strong="H1993"\w* of the \w seas|strong="H3220"\w*; and to the \w rushing|strong="H7588"\w* of \w nations|strong="H3816"\w*, \add that\add* make a rushing like the \w rushing|strong="H7582"\w* of \w mighty|strong="H3524"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*!\f + \fr 17.12 \ft multitude: or, noise\f*\f + \fr 17.12 \ft mighty: or, many\f*

The \w nations|strong="H3816"\w* shall \w rush|strong="H7582"\w* like the \w rushing|strong="H7588"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*: but \add God\add* shall \w rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* them, and they shall \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* far \w off|strong="H4801"\w*, and shall be \w chased|strong="H7291"\w* as the \w chaff|strong="H4671"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, and like a rolling \w thing|strong="H1534"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w whirlwind|strong="H5492"\w*.\f + \fr 17.13 \ft a rolling…: or, thistledown\f*

And behold at \w eveningtide|strong="H6256"\w* \w trouble|strong="H1091"\w*; \add and\add* before the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* he \add is\add* not. This \add is\add* the \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* of them that \w spoil|strong="H8154"\w* us, and the \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* of them that \w rob|strong="H0962"\w* us.
